headline: Dominion Energy Schedules Fourth-Quarter 2024 Earnings Call
summary: January 08, 2025RICHMOND, Va. - Dominion Energy will host its fourth-quarter 2024 earnings call at 10 a.m. ET on Wednesday, Feb. 12, 2025. Management will discuss matters of interest to financial...

headline: Dominion Energy Prepared for Potential Winter Weather Impacts, Urges Customers to Be Ready and Stay Safe
summary: CAYCE, S.C., January 10, 2025--Dominion Energy is prepared for the impact of winter weather in South Carolina this weekend, which is expected to bring a wintry mix of precipitation across parts of the company’s service territory on Friday. The company urges customers to stay safe and be prepared for potential power outages.
